name: Tide WoRLd
description:
Play in fullscreen to make it less blurry. The game doesn't have a win condition, see how far down you can go.

CONTROLS:

arrow keys/WASDmove.waitnumber keyseat/throw berryhold tabview all identified berriesnstart new game

HINTS:
press . while in a shelter to hibernate (resets the weather, heals you, consumes 3 food)
you take damage if your temperature gets too high or low, or your oxygen runs out
if your food meter is completely full you can't eat any more
fire (^) lava (~) fungus (') or burning can light up the darkness
